Cherrycake\Modules\Patterns::wipeCache

wipeCache

Deletes a cached pattern from the cache

    Signature

    public function wipeCache(string $patternName, [boolean $directoryOverride = false] )

    Parameters

    $patternName — string
    The pattern name
    $directoryOverride — boolean
    When specified, the pattern is taken from this directory instead of the default configured directory.
